data.content:
adjective
[more ~; most ~]
chiefly US :able to see things that are far away more clearly than things that are near
He wears glasses because he is farsighted. [=(Brit) longsighted] - compare nearsighted
able to predict what will or might happen in the future
plans made by farsighted city leaders
made or done while thinking about what will happen in the future
farsighted investments
a farsighted plan/approach - opposite shortsighted
